arts.ttl: Lazio travel to Venezia in the hopes of holding on to 4th place
arts.sum: Venezia and Lazio have scored 13 goals from set piece situations (level with Atalanta) in Serie A this season; only Inter (17) and Fiorentina (16) have more so far. Lazio have won their last four Serie A games against Venezia; among sides currently in the competition, only against Cagliari (five) do the Bianconcelesti have a longer open streak of wins in a row.

arts.ttl: Venezia vs Lazio | Serie A | Team News & Probable Lineups
